name: Kanon Original Arrange Album
summary:
Came with the limited edition of the original Kanon PC game. Price listed is for the entire package.

The game was released on June 04, but the date printed on the CD packaging is May 26.

Composed by
   Shinji Orito: 1,4,5,6,7,9,10,11,12
   OdiakeS: 3,8
   KEY: 2

Arranged by
   Magome Togoshi: 1,4,5,6,7,9,10,11
   Shinji Orito: 3,8
   Kazuya Takase (I've): 2,12

All lyrics by KEY
All vocals by AYANA
info:
• 发售日期: 1999-05-26
  • 价格: 8800 JPY
  • 播放时长: 54:47
  • 碟片数量: 1
  • 艺术家: 彩菜
  • 编曲: 折戸伸治, 麻枝准, OdiakeS

disc.title: 9 木々の声と日々のざわめき
